resources.string: Add, Update, or Delete a Washroom

During these COVID times many are searching for usable washrooms but fail to reach their needs.
After many times trying to look for a open store to use their washroom it will be already too late.
This app collects data about which nearby washrooms are open and also collects data on the cleanliness of the facility.
Therefore, users are able to pick and choose the best washrooms around them.

NeedToGo was created by:
Aron Chung and Andrew Lee
Our group name is:
Sorry Jungsoo
